text: Kyungpook National University Law School is one of the professional graduate schools of Kyungpook National University, located in Daeju, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the larger schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 120 students. == Programs== Kyungpook Law specializes in information technology law == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Kyungpook National University Category:Law schools in South Korea ko:경북대학교 법학전문대학원
title: Kyungpook National University Law School
